data.title: Monthly World News Agenda
data.meta_description: HONG KONG (China) - Trial of pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai and Apple Daily under national security law (end date tbc) VIDEO. PICTURE. LIVE VIDEO. (To December 31, 2024)
